thread.title: BRIEF-Beigene Presents Clinical Data On Pamiparib In Chinese Patients With Ovarian Cancers At The American Association For Cancer Research Annual Meeting

title: BRIEF-Beigene Presents Clinical Data On Pamiparib In Chinese Patients With Ovarian Cancers At The American Association For Cancer Research Annual Meeting

organizations.name: american association for cancer research annual
the american association for cancer research annual meeting reuters

text:
Market News April 16, 2018 / 1:31 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Beigene Presents Clinical Data On Pamiparib In Chinese Patients With Ovarian Cancers At The American Association For Cancer Research Annual Meeting Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - Beigene Ltd: 
* BEIGENE PRESENTS CLINICAL DATA ON PAMIPARIB IN CHINESE PATIENTS WITH OVARIAN CANCERS OR TRIPLE-NEGATIVE BREAST CANCER AT THE AMERICAN ASSOCIATION FOR CANCER RESEARCH ANNUAL MEETING 
* BEIGENE LTD - PAMIPARIB WAS SHOWN TO BE GENERALLY WELL TOLERATED 
* BEIGENE LTD - LOOK FORWARD TO ADVANCING PAMIPARIBâ€™S DEVELOPMENT IN CHINA AS WELL AS INITIATING A GLOBAL PHASE 3 TRIAL 
* BEIGENE - IN PATIENTS WITH OVARIAN, BREAST CANCER, PRELIM RESULTS SUPPORT RECOMMENDED PAMIPARIB DOSING REGIMEN, DEMONSTRATED ANTITUMOR ACTIVITY 
* BEIGENE-SAW NO DOSE-LIMITING TOXICITIES, FOUND PAMIPARIB TO BE GENERALLY WELL TOLERATED AMONG THE PRE-TREATED PATIENTS WITH OVARIAN, BREAST CANCERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
